articles.title: Uddhav Thackeray Sends Aides To Eknath Shinde, Head Of Sena's G-22: 10 Facts
articles.description: Uddhav Thackeray, Chief Minister of Maharashtra, has acted against a senior minister who decamped last night for Surat, along with at least 21 other MLAs - a "G-22".  Eknath Shinde is at the centre of the new political crisis.
articles.content: <li>Mr Shinde is now sheltering in place at a resort in Surat in Gujarat. Two Sena leaders are at the Surat hotel where the sulking Mr Shinde is camping. The fact that the G-22 he leads is being host… [+2585 chars]

articles.title: Protesters Attack India Embassy Yoga Event In Maldives
articles.description: Police in the Maldives used tear gas and pepper spray to control a crowd of people who disrupted a yoga event organised by the Indian High Commission, or embassy, in the capital Male on Tuesday morning, an organiser said.
articles.content:
Six people have been arrested in connection with the incident. (Representational)
Male: Police in the Maldives used tear gas and pepper spray to control a crowd of people who disrupted a yoga event … [+1179 chars]

articles.title: Yashwant Sinha selected as joint Opposition candidate for presidential polls
articles.description: Opposition parties have picked former Union Minister Yashwant Sinha as their joint presidential candidate.
articles.content:
Former Union Minister Yashwant Sinha has been selected as the joint Opposition candidate for the upcoming presidential polls. Sinha will file the nomination papers on June 27 at 11.30 am.
